scripts.AdvancedWalking.Generator.NavMesh

Class AbstractShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • scripts.AdvancedWalking.Generator.NavMesh.AbstractShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Polytope

    public abstract class AbstractShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a fragment of the NavMesh, this could be a polygon, rectangle or anything you can set your mind to :-)
    Author:
    Laniax
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateCheapest

        public boolean calculateCheapest(AbstractShape target,
                                 Path path,
                                 java.util.List<AbstractShape> closedList)
        Recursively calculates the cheapest cost route from this shape to another.
        Parameters:
        target - The target we want to reach
        path - The path to add the steps to
        Returns:
        true if a path was found to the target, false otherwise.
